name: Juqster Juqqsy
additional_info:
1.5.1
- added formatting to input fields.

1.5
- added option to resize or hide the player.
- added smaller and compact searchbox popup.

1.4.1
- fixed login notification for firefox.

1.4
- moved hub-info outside the chat area.
- resized login button.

1.3.1
- made the user list smaller; bigger avatar preview on hover.
- lowered opacity for the navigation bar.

1.3
- added notification for user login (load bar on user list with variable duration).

1.2.1
- added version (hover on the navbar logo).
- made chatboxes smaller; reduced font size, avatar and compacted song info.

1.2
- reduced navigation bar size.
- increased page height.
- compacted the room description over the chat.

1.1.1
- changed song time font.

1.1
- fixed user list scrollbar; tweaked user list.
- changed appearance of queue items.
- made the volume controls always visible.
- moved song info in chat over combo boxes.


1.0
- removed rounded images.
- fixed player scrollbar.
- smaller player window.
- changed chat appearance.

style_setting_options.label: Minimal (4 seconds)
1 minute
3 minutes
5 minutes
10 minutes
